PHRASE.LANG: This sword dropped through an inter-dimensional portal. Let's hope the owner doesn't come looking for it... [#Legal]
Cette tombée provient d'un portail interdimensionnel. Espérons que son propriétaire ne viendra pas la chercher...[#Legal]
Dieses Schwert ist durch ein interdimensionales Portal gekommen. Hoffen wir nur, das der Besitzer nicht hinterher kommt ... [#Legal]
Questa spada è caduta qui attraversando un portale interdimensionale. Speriamo che il proprietario non venga a cercarla...[#Legal]
Esta espada llegó a través de un portal interdimensional. Esperemos que su propietario no venga a buscarla...[#Legal]
This sword dropped through an inter-dimensional portal. Let's hope the owner doesn't come looking for it... [#Legal]
This sword dropped through an inter-dimensional portal. Let's hope the owner doesn't come looking for it... [#Legal]
